The font license can be purchased at:
https://typencompany.com


-----------------------

"Qillo Serif Demo Version" is a an original type to recognize. 
The font contains uppercase, lowercase and numerical
This font is great in logotypes and slogans. 
Use it as the go-to font for your business' titles.
